attributes.action: Protect our Cities and Capital by sending in Military
attributes.additional_details:
Our police forces are stretched to the maximum with current events in our Cities & Towns. As good a job they are doing, the rioters need to be surpressed with the curse of Military action and a state of Martial Law imposed in all major cities, leaving the police to concentrate on towns and rural areas.

A stronger force is needed NOW to protect the innocent against such thuggery and devestation.
